name: Machine Gun Mike
description:
Infinite runner game that I made for class. You play as Machine Gun Mike, who is on a skateboard, with a machine gun. 

The game itself is pretty rough around the edges and doesn't have much content.

There is however, a machine gun. 

Controls: 
  • Space to jump; hold to jump higher
  • 'P'  key to shoot
  • Escape to exit to menu
Credits: 
  • Music courtesy of bensound.com
  • Main game  logic learned from superjustin5000 from his super high quality "HOW TO MAKE A GAME LIKE CANABALT" tutorial series on YouTube
  • Font is Elf Boy Classic by heaven castro
  • I referenced sprites from Broforce when drawing Machine Gun Mike
  • All other art and sound effects were created by me
